mixed-citation.article-title: Kryptochroma: a new genus of bark-dwelling crab spiders (Araneae, Thomisidae)

tp:treatment-sec.p:
Stephanopis furcillata Keyserling, 1880: 179
, pl. 4 fig. 98 (female holotype from Brazil , deposited in ZMHB 2406, examined).

We propose
Stephanopis furcillata
as senior synonym of
Sidymella multispinulosa (Mello-Leitão, 1944)
, based on the distinct opisthosoma presenting a long pair of projections with a terminal tubercle at their tips ( Fig. 24C–D ).
